articles.description: Euro 2024 gets underway as hosts Germany take on Scotland in Munich while England continue preparations - follow the latest from our teams in Germany.
articles.title: Euro 2024 live: Build-up to the start of the tournament as Scotland face hosts Germany

articles.description: Follow live text updates from day two of the US Open at Pinehurst in North Carolina.
articles.title: US Open LIVE round two: Joint leader McIlroy among the early starters at Pinehurst

articles.description: Euro 2024 is finally here so how will the home nations fare and who are the favourites to win the tournament?
articles.title: Euro 2024: Will England win it? Can Scotland cause an upset?

articles.description: Afghanistan beat Papua New Guinea by seven wickets to qualify for the T20 World Cup Super 8s and eliminate New Zealand.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Afghanistan beat Papua New Guinea to qualify for Super 8s

articles.description: Follow the latest from the Scotland camp as they build up to Friday's Euro 2024 opener against hosts Germany.
articles.title: Scotland at Euro 2024 build-up

articles.description: Tennis great Roger Federer speaks to BBC Breakfast about his great rivalries, life after retirement and why he is excited about Euro 2024.
articles.title: Roger Federer on Andy Murray, Rafael Nadal, Novak Djokovic, retirement and the Euros

articles.description: Throughout the Scotland squad there are stories of players fighting back from heartbreaking rejection, flak from fans and very serious injury, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland's renaissance men ready for Germany

articles.description: Pat Cummins insists Australia never considered manipulating the result of their T20 World Cup match against Scotland to knock out England.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Australia never considered manipulating result to eliminate England, says Pat Cumins

articles.description: Jacksonville Jaguars quarterback Trevor Lawrence agrees a five-year contract extension worth a reported $275m (£216m).
articles.title: Trevor Lawrence: Jacksonville Jaguars quarterback agrees new five-year £216m deal
